title: Meditation: Awakening Our Full Aliveness
itunes:title: Meditation: Awakening Our Full Aliveness
description:
Meditation: Awakening Our Full Aliveness - We cut off from our aliveness when we are lost in thoughts and on auto pilot. This meditation arouses a receptivity to sensation from “the inside out,” opens the awareness to sound, and then invites a full resting in receptive, dynamic presence.

Join Tara's email community, to receive exclusive updates, events, and meditations. - Get a free download of Tara’s new 10 min meditation: “Mindful Breathing: Finding Calm and Ease," - plus a bonus gift: "8 Essential Tips to Nourish Your Meditation Practice."
